Rulings.Edison: ●Tributing 1 monster is a cost to activate the effect to return “Sword of Sparkles” to your Deck. If “Sword of Sparkles” is equipped to a monster that is unaffected by Spells, the effect to destroy 1 card your opponent controls still applies. Both effects of this card start a Chain.

Rulings.Base: 1. Tributing 1 monster is a cost to activate the effect to return "Sword of Sparkles" to your Deck.\n2. If "Sword of Sparkles" is equipped to a monster that is unaffected by Spells, the effect to destroy 1 card your opponent controls still applies.\n3. Both effects of this card start a Chain.
